featured.text: According to the legend, notes of 33 plans for a revolution to overthrow the Mongols were hidden in mooncakes that would ordinarily have been stuffed with sweet bean paste.
One of these stories 32 the cookie’s origin back to 13th- and 14th-century China, which was then occupied by the Mongols.

definition.zh_def: 蒙古人，指來自蒙古的民族，歷史上以游牧生活和征服著稱。
definition.en_def: The Mongols are a Central Asian ethnic group known for their nomadic lifestyle and historical conquests.
definition.example: The Mongols established one of the largest empires in history under Genghis Khan.
